Package manager

Class SortManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.SortManager
  • public class SortManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The SortManager class handles sorting of shapes based on various criteria. It reads shapes from a file, sorts them using different sorting algorithms, and prints the sorted shapes according to user-specified options.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SortManager

        public SortManager​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Constructs a SortManager object with command-line arguments. Parses the arguments, reads shapes from file, performs sorting, and prints results.
        Parameters:
        args - The command-line arguments specifying file name, sort type, and compare type.

    • Method Detail

      • getComparator

        private java.util.Comparator<_03Shape> getComparator()
        Retrieves the comparator object based on the comparison type of area or volume.
        Returns:
        The comparator object used for sorting shapes.

      • parseArguments

        private void parseArguments​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parses the command-line arguments and sets the file name, sort type, and compare type. Prints error messages if any argument is missing or invalid.
        Parameters:
        args - The array of command-line arguments.

      • readShapesFromFile

        private void readShapesFromFile()
        Reads shapes data from the specified file and creates corresponding shape objects. Stores the created shapes in the 'shapes' array. Prints error messages for invalid shape types or file format errors.

      • createShape

        private _03Shape createShape​(java.lang.String shapeName,
                             double height,
                             double parameter)
        Creates a shape object based on the shape name and parameters. Uses reflection to instantiate the appropriate shape class dynamically.
        Parameters:
        shapeName - The name of the shape.
        height - The height of the shape.
        parameter - Additional parameter (e.g., radius, side length) depending on the shape.
        Returns:
        The created shape object, or null if the shape type is invalid.

      • benchmarkAndSort

        private void benchmarkAndSort()
        Benchmarks and performs sorting of shapes based on the chosen sorting algorithm. Prints the time taken for sorting using the selected algorithm. If the comparison type is 'h', the sorting algorithms are performed using natural ordering based on shape height; otherwise, the sorting algorithms use custom comparators for comparing shapes by base area or volume.

      • getSortAlgorithmName

        private java.lang.String getSortAlgorithmName()
        Retrieves the name of the sorting algorithm based on the selected sort type.
        Returns:
        The name of the selected sorting algorithm.

      • printSortedShapes

        private void printSortedShapes()
        Prints the sorted shapes according to the specified format. Prints the first, every thousandth, and last sorted shapes. Also, provides an option to print all sorted shapes.
